attributes.action: stop payments to members of the IRA
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As a x member of the army and after serving 4 tours of duty in belfast or londonderry trying to stop paramilitrys from killing and maiming people of this country why should we pay money to x IRA members familys who have been killed whilst there family member has been fighting a terrirost campain against british troops and the goverment.

Pay money to the familys of those killed by the terrirosts including the troops killed whilst putting there lives on the line.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
